feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.5.11
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: billing webhook secret by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17005
  • fix: Prettier error and EmailField import error due to Attributes query PR by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17011
  • feat: Support headless router as well in embed by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17012
  • fix: schema.prisma path by @sateshcharan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17018
  • feat: mass assign attributes by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16995
  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17021
  • fix: URLs to images in docs by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17022
  • feat: add nextcloud talk app by @CodeShakingSheep in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16455
  • feat: Skip contact owner even if it matches attribute routing by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17015
  • chore: Removed development only docs tags by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17028
  • fix: padding in TeamPill (and hence TeamRole) by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17030
  • test: Add Attributes Routing e2e and some more unit tests by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17032
  • fix: add missing options for team memberlist table by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17017
  • fix: add a bunch of missing pages including v1 slot info by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17034
  • feat: event type tabs platform wrapper by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16891
  • feat: additional calendar selector for calendar settings atom by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16874
  • feat: google meet conferencing api v2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17023
  • fix: DatePicker not showing up in mobile mode when hideEventTypeDetails is true by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17037
  • feat: advanced tab platform wrapper by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16941
  • chore: Update EWS package by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16950
  • chore: docs changes by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17031
  • fix: API V1 Bookings, pick attendee id in response by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17041
  • chore: Add typings for DOMPurify by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17047
  • feat: Add Eastern and Eastern Pacific time zones #16880 by @ShreyTanna29 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16974
  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17042
  • perf: Add index to EventType for parentId by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17049
  • feat: automatic no show by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16727
  • perf: Use UNION to get public user event types by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17052
  • perf: refactor and replacing viewer.teams.getMinimal with viewer.teams.get by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16552
  • chore: v4.5.11 by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17053

New Contributors

  • @sateshcharan made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17018
  • @ShreyTanna29 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16974

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.5.10...v4.5.11

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.6.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17051
  • chore: Update CI to not run all checks for docs/translations by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17054
  • fix: add billing tab in platform navigation sidebar by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17060
  • fix: add node-gyp as dev dependency by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17058
  • chore: remove react-query, update next.js to v13.5.6 by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17057
  • fix: phone number input field is missing from the mail by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17035
  • chore: settings/my-account - remove pages router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17056
  • fix: attendee name workflow variables in spanish by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17068
  • feat: Salesforce choose how to save attendees & other options by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17009
  • fix: lock on user view by @ezhil56x in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17077
  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17076
  • fix: Docs build issue by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17082
  • feat: telli.so app by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17083
  • fix: Daterangepicker is not opening in some browsers by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17087
  • fix: atoms tooltip by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17073
  • fix: broken ui in edit location dialog issue by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16013
  • perf: improve get bookings performance by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16303
  • fix: Update stripe trials for teams by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17092
  • refactor: v2 recurring bookings allow specifying recurrence count by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16989
  • fix: Memory leak with cal embed modal box by @nusr in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17016
  • fix: 500 status code visible when cancelling event by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16957
  • feat: member management for platform by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16803
  • chore: fixed docs support URL by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17085
  • fix: email-address with apostrophe not accepted by @RajdeepDs in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15535
  • fix: Update constants.ts - fix crashing by adding optional chaining for th… by @mavishay in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17103
  • chore: Add docs build by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17101
  • fix: PR update workflow duplicate job by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17108
  • refactor: improve variable logic by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17086
  • feat: update github workflows to install playwright in a separate job by @Aditya-A-G in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17070
  • fix: theme flickering by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16903
  • fix: Playwright install by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17113
  • revert: "feat: update github workflows to install playwright in a sepa… by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17114
  • fix: Fix TS error + set isPending on Button by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17118
  • feat: allow delete event-type platform atoms by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17065
  • fix: Issue chargin no show fee by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17066
  • fix: Add back missing Any in and Not in operators for Single Select by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17102
  • fix: link is not rendering properly for SMS and WhatsApp workflows by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17116
  • chore: revamp platform docs by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17117
  • feat: #15416 Expand round robin availability beyond default schedule by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15618
  • fix: update meeting token if expired by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17096
  • feat: attributes filter / refactor of user data table by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17014
  • chore: Release v4.6.0 by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17121

New Contributors

  • @ezhil56x made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17077
  • @mavishay made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17103
  • @retrogtx made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17086
  • @Aditya-A-G made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17070

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.5.11...v4.6.0

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.6.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: organizationId called on possibly undefined profile array by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17123
  • chore: release v4.6.1 by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17125

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.6.0...v4.6.1

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.6.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17120
  • chore: developer docs updates by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17112
  • chore: refactor create event -type forms by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17106
  • fix: Hotfix - Revert hideEventTypeDetails handling in Booker.tsx by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17130
  • feat: Event availability platform wrapper by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17091
  • feat: added custom class name to booker and availability atom by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17105
  • fix: pass from org link to all instances of event.public by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17136
  • fix: Update openapi-v1.json bookings post example by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17132
  • fix: Replace hardcoded username error with translation key by @thevrus in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17129
  • fix: Add support for multiselect_some_in for attributes query by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17144
  • chore: add logs for debugging by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17111
  • chore: Release v4.6.2 by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17146

New Contributors

  • @thevrus made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17129

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.6.1...v4.6.2

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.6.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: increase pagination managed users endpoint by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17147
  • feat: create event type atom by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17142
  • feat: event team Assignment tab atom by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17145
  • fix: event-types locations output schema apiv2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17150
  • fix: Hide invite_new_member_description cost from users within an org by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17149
  • fix: Possible perf improvement and logging for team members routing logic by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17154
  • fix: select_any_in operator - Broken only for attributes by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17148
  • perf: Add indices to Membership by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17160
  • perf: Add index for invalid column in Credential by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17162
  • chore: v4.6.3 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17161

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.6.2...v4.6.3
